dt: {bc}the part of a Communion rite in which the bread and wine are consecrated

shortdef: the act or ceremony of consecrating
the part of a Communion rite in which the bread and wine are consecrated

dt: {bc}the act of dedicating oneself to a sacred purpose {bc}the act of {d_link|consecrating|consecrate:2} oneself

dt.t: Every one … shares in Christ's {wi}self-consecration{/wi} on our behalf.
At the same time, a tuft of hair is cut in a symbolic tonsure, an act of {wi}self-consecration{/wi} to God.

shortdef: the act of dedicating oneself to a sacred purpose : the act of consecrating oneself
